"Akatsuki": "Bruder's always been the sort of guy who's wholly focused on training up the next generation of ARKS."
"But I never thought he'd find someone quite as gifted as yourself."
"As someone who's building up a platoon, I should also think more about training up my subordinates."
"Yo, you showed up at a good time!"
"Going forward, my 1st Platoon has started prioritizing the extermination of Dread Enemies."
"The scope of activities has increased for researchers and engineers, so we have to start reducing the risks for non-combatants."
"I want to ask you to help with that effort. What do you say?"
"Your target is a Dread Enemy in Stia's Fringes."
"Please lend us your strength. Good luck out there!"
"Mm, it can't be helped. Let me know if you change your mind."
"Thanks to your efforts, it's gotten easier to carry out our activities."
"However, it's not as if we're done just yet."
"After Stia's Fringes, our scope will extend into Dreisen Plant, and then into Outer Mediola."
"I want you to keep helping with our Dread Enemy sweep-up operation."
"Will you help us?"
"I want you to continue helping us with our Dread Enemy sweep-up operation in Dreisen Plant."
"Keep your wits about you. Good luck!"
"Understood. Come back when you have the time."
"I've been waiting."
"We're finally moving up our activities into Mediola."
"This mission will be incomparably dangerous, more so than any I've given you yet."
"Even so, will you accept it?"
"Bring down a Dread Enemy in Outer Mediola: Sector 2."
"This battle will likely be one of our harshest yet, but with your help, things should surely turn out well."
"I shall pray for your success!"
"I see. Let me know when your preparations are fully in order."
"From the bottom of my heart, I am stunned by your abilities."
"I'll be sure to tell Bruder about the extent of your efforts out here. I'm sure he'll be thrilled to hear it."
"You've set an incredible example for us all here in the 1st Platoon."
"I look forward to what the future holds."
